languages.text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекают бумаги — пергаменты и свитки, просыпавшиеся со стола и запятнанные кровью. Наклонившись, вы замечаете еще кое-что — мелкие осколки стекла, усеявшие пол.{/n}

{n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваше внимание привлекают бумаги — пергаменты и свитки, просыпавшиеся со стола и запятнанные кровью. Наклонившись, вы замечаете еще кое-что — мелкие осколки стекла, усеявшие пол.{/n}

{n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}地板上的某件东西引起了你的注意，那是一堆溅满血迹的羊皮纸和卷轴，肯定是从桌子上掉下来的。当你俯下身子仔细观察时，你还注意到了另一件东西——地上散落着细小的玻璃碎片。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}地板上的某件东西引起了你的注意，那是一堆溅满血迹的羊皮纸和卷轴，肯定是从桌子上掉下来的。当你俯下身子仔细观察时，你还注意到了另一件东西——地上散落着细小的玻璃碎片。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Algo en el suelo te llama la atención: un montón de pergaminos ensangrentados que han caído del escritorio. Al inclinarte para verlos mejor, notas algo más: fragmentos de cristal dispersos por el suelo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Algo en el suelo te llama la atención: un montón de pergaminos ensangrentados que han caído del escritorio. Al inclinarte para verlos mejor, notas algo más: fragmentos de cristal dispersos por el suelo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}床にある何かがあなたの目に止まる。机から落ちたであろう、血が飛び散った羊皮紙と巻物の山だ。よく見ようと身をかがめてみると、床に小さなガラスの破片が散乱していることに気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}床にある何かがあなたの目に止まります。机から落ちたであろう、血が飛び散った羊皮紙と巻物の山だ。よく見ようと身をかがめてみると、床に小さなガラスの破片が散乱していることに気づいた。{/n}
{n}床にある何かがあなたの目に止まる。机から落ちたであろう、血が飛び散った羊皮紙と巻物の山だ。よく見ようと身をかがめてみると、床に小さなガラスの破片が散乱していることに気づいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Quelque chose sur le sol attire votre attention : une pile de feuilles et de parchemins maculés de sang qui ont dû tomber du bureau. En vous penchant pour les regarder de plus près, vous remarquez autre chose : de petits éclats de verre éparpillés par terre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Quelque chose sur le sol attire votre attention : une pile de feuilles et de parchemins maculés de sang qui ont dû tomber du bureau. En vous penchant pour les regarder de plus près, vous remarquez autre chose : de petits éclats de verre éparpillés par terre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Etwas auf dem Boden erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit: ein Haufen blutbespritzter Pergamente und Schriftrollen, die vom Schreibtisch gefallen sein müssen. Als du dich für einen genaueren Blick hinunterbeugst, bemerkst du noch etwas: Kleine Glassplitter sind auf dem Boden verstreut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Etwas auf dem Boden erregt deine Aufmerksamkeit: ein Haufen blutbespritzter Pergamente und Schriftrollen, die vom Schreibtisch gefallen sein müssen. Als du dich für einen genaueren Blick hinunterbeugst, bemerkst du noch etwas: Kleine Glassplitter sind auf dem Boden verstreut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yerdeki bir şey gözüne çarpıyor: Masadan düşmüş olması muhtemel, kana bulanmış bir parşömen ve tomar yığını. Daha yakından bakmak için eğildiğinde bir şey daha fark ediyorsun: Zemine saçılmış ufak tefek cam parçaları.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Something on the floor catches your eye: a heap of blood-spattered parchments and scrolls that must have fallen off the desk. As you lean down for a closer look, you notice something else: small shards of glass scattered on the floor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yerdeki bir şey gözüne çarpıyor: Masadan düşmüş olması muhtemel, kana bulanmış bir parşömen ve tomar yığını. Daha yakından bakmak için eğildiğinde bir şey daha fark ediyorsun: Zemine saçılmış ufak tefek cam parçaları.{/n}
